annotations.description: Template for deploying registry web console. Requires cluster-admin.
annotations.kubectl.kubernetes.io/last-applied-confi: {"apiVersion":"template.openshift.io/v1","kind":"Template","labels":{"createdBy":"registry-console-template"},"metadata":{"annotations":{"description":"Template for deploying registry web console. e.g. for \"registry.redhat.io/openshift3/registry-console:v3.11\"","name":"IMAGE_NAME","value":"openshift3/registry-console:latest"},{"description":"The public URL for the Openshift OAuth Provider, e.g. https://openshift.example.com:8443","name":"OPENSHIFT_OAUTH_PROVIDER_URL","required":true},{"description":"The registry console URL. This should be created beforehand using 'oc create route passthrough --service registry-console --port registry-console -n default', e.g. https://registry-console-default.example.com","name":"COCKPIT_KUBE_URL","required":true},{"description":"Oauth client secret","from":"user[a-zA-Z0-9]{64}","generate":"expression","name":"OPENSHIFT_OAUTH_CLIENT_SECRET"},{"description":"Oauth client id","name":"OPENSHIFT_OAUTH_CLIENT_ID","value":"cockpit-oauth-client"},{"description":"The integrated registry hostname exposed via route, e.g. registry.example.com","name":"REGISTRY_HOST","required":true}]}

parameters.name: IMAGE_NAME
parameters.description: Specify fully qualified image name and version; e.g. for "registry.redhat.io/openshift3/registry-console:v3.11"

parameters.name: OPENSHIFT_OAUTH_PROVIDER_URL
parameters.description: The public URL for the Openshift OAuth Provider, e.g. https://openshift.example.com:8443

parameters.name: COCKPIT_KUBE_URL
parameters.description: The registry console URL. This should be created beforehand using 'oc create route passthrough --service registry-console --port registry-console -n default', e.g. https://registry-console-default.example.com

parameters.name: REGISTRY_HOST
parameters.description: The integrated registry hostname exposed via route, e.g. registry.example.com
